name: userprompt-rewrite-ultrahink
description: Substitute '-u' with 'ultrathink. Take as much time as you need.' in user prompts
command: let d='';process.stdin.setEncoding('utf8');process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const e=JSON.parse(d);const p=(e.prompt||'');if(/(^|\s)-u(\s|$)/.test(p)){const newPrompt=p.replace(/(^|\s)-u(\s|$)/g,'$1ultrathink. Take as much time as you need.$2');const out={decision:'continue',prompt:newPrompt};process.stdout.write(JSON.stringify(out));process.exit(0);}else{process.exit(0);}}catch(err){process.exit(0)}});
